block.description: ConductorOne API: The ConductorOne API is a HTTP API for managing ConductorOne resources.

certify_policy_id.description: The certifyPolicyId is the ID of the policy that will be used for access review certify tasks.

grant_policy_id.description: The grantPolicyId field is the policy that will be used for access request grant tasks.

monthly_cost_usd.description: The monthlyCostUsd field is the monthly cost per seat for the given app.

owners.description: The owners field is a list of user IDs indicating the app owners.

parent_app_id.description: The parentAppId field is the ID of the parent app if one exists.

revoke_policy_id.description: The revokePolicyId is the ID of the policy that will be used for revoke access tasks.

user_count.description: The userCount field is the number of app users that are associated with the app.

app_id.description: The appId field.

certify_policy_id.description: The certifyPolicyId is the ID of the policy that will be used for access review certify tasks.

compliance_framework_value_ids.description: ComplianceFrameworkValueIds is a list of ComplianceFramework attributes that are set on the app entitlement.

emergency_grant_enabled.description: The emergencyGrantEnabled field determines whether or not this entitlement has an emergency grant policy.

emergency_grant_policy_id.description:
The emergencyGrantPolicyId field is the ID of the grant policy that will be used for emergency grant tasks. 
				To set this field, emergencyGrantEnabled must be set to true.

grant_policy_id.description: The grantPolicyId field is the policy that will be used for access request grant tasks.

duration_grant.description:
The DurationGrant field is a string attribute that represents the maximum duration a grant to this entitlement can last. 
						The format of this is <time in seconds>s. i.e. 1h = 3600s.

duration_unset.description: The DurationUnset field is set if there is no maximum duration a grant to this entitlement can last.

max_grant_duration.description:
MaxGrantDuration is a one of.
This message contains a oneof. Only a single field of the following list may be set at a time:
  - duration_unset
  - duration_grant

app_id.description: The appId field.

user_ids.description: The userIds field.

provision_policy.description:
The ProvisionPolicy message is the Provision strategy that will be used for granting access for this entitlement.
This message contains a oneof. Only a single field of the following list may be set at a time:
  - connector
  - manual
  - delegated

revoke_policy_id.description: The revokePolicyId field is the ID of the policy that will be used for revoke access tasks.

risk_level_value_id.description: The riskLevelValueId field is the ID of the risk level attribute value that will be set on the app entitlement.

user_ids.description: The user_ids field for the users to set as an owner of the app entitlement.

app_id.description: The appId field.
The appId field.

user_ids.description: The userIds field.

provision_policy.description:
The ProvisionPolicy message.
This message contains a oneof. Only a single field of the following list may be set at a time:
  - connector
  - manual
  - delegated

at_type.description: The type of the serialized message.

published.description: The published field is used to determine if the catalog is active and visible to users.

visible_to_everyone.description: The visibleToEveryone field is used to determine if this catalog should be visible to all users.

app_id.description: The appId field.
The appId field.

value.description: The value field is the value of the attribute. In this case it is the name of the Compliance Framework (e.g. SOC2, HIPAA, etc.).

app_id.description: The appId field.
The ID for the Application that this integration should connected to.

created_at.description: The time this integration was created.

deleted_at.description: The time this integration was deleted.

updated_at.description: The time this integration was last updated.

user_ids.description: A list of user IDs of who owns this integration. It defaults to the user who created the integration.

app_id.description: The ID for the Application that this integration should connected to.

aws_sso_enable.description: Enable support for AWS IAM Identity Center (successor to AWS Single Sign-On)

aws_sso_region.description: Region for AWS IAM Identity Center (successor to AWS Single Sign-On)

aws_sso_scim_access_token.description: SCIM access token for AWS IAM Identity Center (successor to AWS Single Sign-On)

aws_sso_scim_enable.description: Enable usage of the AWS IAM Identity Center SCIM API (successor to AWS Single Sign-On)

aws_sso_scim_endpoint.description: SCIM endpoint for AWS IAM Identity Center (successor to AWS Single Sign-On)

okta_dont_sync_inactive_apps.description: Don't include inactive apps in the sync. Defaults to false. If set to true, the integration will only sync active apps.

okta_extract_aws_saml_roles.description: Extract AWS SAML roles from Okta SAML responses. Defaults to false. If set to true, the integration will extract AWS SAML roles from Okta SAML responses.

app_id.description: The appId field.

allow_self_approval.description: App owner is based on the app id and doesn't need to have self-contained data
Entitlement owner is based on the current entitlement's id and doesn't need to have self-contained data

fallback_user_ids.description: Self approval is the target of the ticket

user_ids.description: The userIds field.

approval.description:
The Approval field is used to define who should perform the review.
This message contains a oneof. Only a single field of the following list may be set at a time:
  - users
  - manager
  - appOwners
  - group
  - self
  - entitlementOwners

app_id.description: The appId field.

user_ids.description: The userIds field.

provision_policy.description:
The ProvisionPolicy message.
This message contains a oneof. Only a single field of the following list may be set at a time:
  - connector
  - manual
  - delegated

policy_type.description:
must be one of [POLICY_TYPE_UNSPECIFIED, POLICY_TYPE_GRANT, POLICY_TYPE_REVOKE, POLICY_TYPE_CERTIFY, POLICY_TYPE_ACCESS_REQUEST, POLICY_TYPE_PROVISION]
The policyType field.

certify_remediate_immediately.description:
ONLY valid when used in a CERTIFY Ticket Type:
 Causes any deprovision or change in a grant to be applied when Certify Ticket is closed.
See the documentation for `c1.api.policy.v1.PolicyPostActions` for more details.

value.description: The value field is the value of the attribute. In this case it is the name of the Risk Level (e.g. High, Low, etc.).

certify_policy_id.description: The certifyPolicyId is the ID of the policy that will be used for access review certify tasks.

grant_policy_id.description: The grantPolicyId field is the policy that will be used for access request grant tasks.

monthly_cost_usd.description: The monthlyCostUsd field is the monthly cost per seat for the given app.

owners.description: The owners field is a list of user IDs indicating the app owners.

parent_app_id.description: The parentAppId field is the ID of the parent app if one exists.

revoke_policy_id.description: The revokePolicyId is the ID of the policy that will be used for revoke access tasks.

user_count.description: The userCount field is the number of app users that are associated with the app.

app_id.description: The appId field.

certify_policy_id.description: The certifyPolicyId is the ID of the policy that will be used for access review certify tasks.

compliance_framework_value_ids.description: ComplianceFrameworkValueIds is a list of ComplianceFramework attributes that are set on the app entitlement.

emergency_grant_enabled.description: The emergencyGrantEnabled field determines whether or not this entitlement has an emergency grant policy.

emergency_grant_policy_id.description:
The emergencyGrantPolicyId field is the ID of the grant policy that will be used for emergency grant tasks. 
				To set this field, emergencyGrantEnabled must be set to true.

grant_policy_id.description: The grantPolicyId field is the policy that will be used for access request grant tasks.

app_id.description: The appId field.

user_ids.description: The userIds field.

provision_policy.description:
The ProvisionPolicy message is the Provision strategy that will be used for granting access for this entitlement.
This message contains a oneof. Only a single field of the following list may be set at a time:
  - connector

  - delegated

The ProvisionPolicy message.
This message contains a oneof. Only a single field of the following list may be set at a time:

policy_type.description:
must be one of [POLICY_TYPE_UNSPECIFIED, POLICY_TYPE_GRANT, POLICY_TYPE_REVOKE, POLICY_TYPE_CERTIFY, POLICY_TYPE_ACCESS_REQUEST, POLICY_TYPE_PROVISION]

ONLY valid when used in a CERTIFY Ticket Type:
 Causes any deprovision or change in a grant to be applied when Certify Ticket is closed.
See the documentation for `c1.api.policy.v1.PolicyPostActions` for more details.

directory_status.description:
must be one of [UNKNOWN, ENABLED, DISABLED, DELETED]
The directoryStatus field.
